title: Gate Form Filling
description: The last date to fill out the GATE 2026 application form without a late fee is September 28, 2025. If you miss this deadline, you can still apply with a late fee until October 9, 2025. The application window is currently open, having begun on August 28, 2025. Applications can be submitted online through the GATE Online Application Processing System (GOAPS) on the official website: gate2026.iitg.ac.in.
